pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Smoothing by Interpolating Cubic Splines // We construct the explicit form of clamped cubic interpolating spline (both uniform - knots are equidistant and non-uniform - knots are arbitrary). Using this form, we propose a linear regression model suitable for real data smoothing. This package is based on a diploma thesis Hudak (2017) https://opac.crzp.sk/?fn=detai lBiblioFormsid=7FE4E0810F66E41DF9A9CA23557Fseo=CRZP-detail- kniha.
